name: PointHub
tag_list: rewards, loyalty-shopping, points, miles, frequent-flyer-miles, reward-points, reward-management
description: Manage and use your reward points.
overview:
PointHub is an online loyalty management and shopping destination.

PointHub’s patent-pending Cash vs. PointsÂ® Recommendation Engine strengthens consumer decision-making through real-time, side-by-side comparisons between purchase price and rewards points.

PointHub simplifies reward management through PointTracker which supports over 300 loyalty programs. PointTracker monitors account balances, flight credits, airline vouchers, tier-status progress, pending itineraries, and expiration dates.

PointHub notifies registered users when their miles, points, flight credits, or airline vouchers are about to expire and provides recommendations on how best to use them.
